resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
  <identifier>
    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/156561</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>156561</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>ILMoE</catalog>
            <entry>ILMoE2175</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Grammar work sheet on reported speech</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Grammatikarbeit Blatt auf berichteter Rede</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Feuille de travail de grammaire sur le discours 
enregistré</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Folha do trabalho da gramática no discurso 
relatado</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Foglio del lavoro di grammatica su discorso 
segnalato</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Φύλλο εργασίας γραμματικής στην αναφερόμενη ομιλία</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Hoja del trabajo de la gramática en discurso 
señalado</string>
          </title>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This is a work sheet for 11th grade students to change sentences from Direct to reported speech</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">grammar</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">direct speech</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">reported speech.</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Dieses ist ein Arbeit Blatt, damit 11. 
Gradkursteilnehmer Programmsätze von direktem zu berichteter Rede 
ändern</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">C'est une feuille de travail pour que les 11èmes
étudiants de catégorie changent des phrases de directement au 
discours enregistré</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta é uma folha do trabalho para que os 11os 
estudantes da classe mudem sentenças de direto ao discurso relatado</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Ciò è un foglio del lavoro affinchè gli 
undicesimi allievi del grado cambi le frasi da direttamente a discorso
segnalato</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτό είναι ένα φύλλο εργασίας για τους 11ους 
σπουδαστές βαθμού για να αλλάξει τις προτάσεις από άμεση σε 
αναφερόμενη ομιλία</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esto es una hoja del trabajo para que los 11mos 
estudiantes del grado cambien sentencias de directo al discurso 
señalado</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Grammatik</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">direkte Rede</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">berichtete Rede.</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">grammaire</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">discours direct</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">discours enregistré.</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">gramática</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">discurso direto</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">discurso relatado.</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">grammatica</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">discorso diretto</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">discorso segnalato.</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">γραμματική</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">άμεση ομιλία</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">αναφερόμενη ομιλία.</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">gramática</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">discurso directo</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">discurso señalado.</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <lifeCycle>
          <status>

            <value>final</value>
          </status>
          <contribute>

          <contribute>

          <metadataSchema>LREv4.0</metadataSchema>

        <educational>
          <learningResourceType>

          </learningResourceType>
          <typicalAgeRange>
            <string language="en">16-18</string>

          <context>

          </intendedEndUserRole>

        </educational>
        <rights>

        <classification>
